details.message:
`005.001.001 Active_Work_Order`
- Test generates a Work Order for "Test Asset Gamma" for Account "SMCT 001".
- Uses "SMCT Workflow" in the "Testing Department".
- Workflow is comprised of "Stage A", "Stage B", and "Stage C".
- Crew "Crewmate" is assigned to all three of these stages.
- To generate workflow, see 001.007.001. 
- To generate workstages, see 001.008.001.
details.name: 005.001.001 Active_Work_Order
